NOTES:
This is a re-encode of a custom dvdr....the same source THS used.Wasn&#039;t going to up this due to THS beat me
to it.....but have still been asked so...
Quality wise there isn&#039;t going to be to much difference between this and the THS release,so if you have that you
might not want to grab this one.
The source itself is not bad for a cam,more than watchable.....it&#039;s also subbed,and the audio is your typical cam audio
but it&#039;s clear so you can hear whats beig said fine.


WORK DONE:
firstly cropped the top and bottom slightly to give it a smooth finish.....also brighten it up and add more colour by changing
the contrast,gamma,lum and chroma.
Didn&#039;t crop the subs because you&#039;d lose too much of the picture.
Audio has just been boosted to 200%.
